tasks.title: Create project skeleton, shared libs, and build pipeline for agentlabd/agentlab
tasks.details: Set up repo layout, shared config/models/proxmox libs, and Makefile targets (build, lint, test) with CI-ready outputs.

tasks.title: Implement host install script and systemd unit for agentlabd
tasks.details: Install binaries, create /etc/agentlab + /var/lib/agentlab + /var/log/agentlab + /run/agentlab, enable agentlabd.service, and verify socket permissions.

tasks.title: Create agent-only bridge (vmbr1) and enable IP forwarding
tasks.details: Provision 10.77.0.0/16 with host IP 10.77.0.1 and persist sysctl forwarding.

tasks.title: Configure nftables NAT and LAN/ULA egress blocks for agent subnet
tasks.details: Masquerade 10.77.0.0/16 to vmbr0, allow established/related, and block RFC1918/link-local/ULA ranges with persistent rules.

tasks.title: Set up Tailscale subnet routing with asymmetric firewall policy
tasks.details: Advertise 10.77.0.0/16 and allow tailnet→sandbox connections while blocking sandbox→tailnet new connections.

tasks.title: Create connectivity smoke test script for sandbox networking
tasks.details: Validate Internet egress, LAN/tailnet blocks, and DNS resolution from a sandbox.

tasks.title: Implement Proxmox backend interface with shell-based qm/pvesh backend
tasks.details: Support clone, configure, start/stop/destroy, status query, and IP discovery hooks with unit tests.

tasks.title: Manage cloud-init snippet lifecycle for sandboxes
tasks.details: Generate minimal user-data snippets (hostname, SSH key, bootstrap token), store in snippets storage, and delete on teardown.

tasks.title: Implement IP discovery via qemu-guest-agent with DHCP fallback
tasks.details: Poll qga with backoff for vmbr1 address and fallback to DHCP lease parsing.

tasks.title: Build agentlabd core service and config/profile loader
tasks.details: Load /etc/agentlab/config.yaml and /etc/agentlab/profiles/*.yaml; bind Unix socket and guest bootstrap listener.

tasks.title: Implement SQLite schema and migrations for core tables
tasks.details: Create sandboxes, jobs, profiles, workspaces, bootstrap_tokens, and events tables with migration runner.

tasks.title: Build sandbox state machine and lease/TTL engine
tasks.details: Persist deterministic transitions and background GC for expired sandboxes, including keepalive renewals.

tasks.title: Implement local control API over Unix socket
tasks.details: Expose job/sandbox CRUD endpoints, lease renewals, and document in docs/api.md with versioned request/response types.

tasks.title: Implement job orchestration flow (create → run → report → destroy)
tasks.details: Create sandbox with bootstrap token, wait for runner updates, persist results/artifacts metadata, and destroy if ephemeral.

tasks.title: Implement secrets-at-rest bundle format with encryption
tasks.details: Support age/sops-encrypted bundles for git/LLM credentials and artifact tokens with rotation docs.

tasks.title: Implement one-time bootstrap token issuance and validation
tasks.details: Mint short-lived tokens, store hash+expiry, and mark consumed on first successful fetch.

tasks.title: Build guest bootstrap API (/v1/bootstrap/fetch) bound to vmbr1
tasks.details: Return minimal secrets/job payloads, authenticate by token+vmid, and enforce agent-subnet-only access.

tasks.title: Create Ubuntu template build script with cloud-init + qemu-guest-agent
tasks.details: Download cloud image, create VM, enable qga, install base packages, and convert to template.

tasks.title: Package agent CLIs into the template with a dispatcher wrapper
tasks.details: Install and pin Claude Code CLI, OpenAI Codex CLI, and OpenCode CLI; provide /usr/local/bin/agentlab-agent.

tasks.title: Implement agent-runner service for guest bootstrap and execution
tasks.details: Fetch bootstrap payload, store secrets in tmpfs, clone repo, run agent loop, stream logs/status, and upload artifacts.

tasks.title: Add secrets cleanup on guest stop
tasks.details: Wipe /run/secrets and temporary repo directories via ExecStopPost or dedicated cleanup unit.

tasks.title: Implement agentlab CLI commands for jobs and sandbox management
tasks.details: Provide job run, sandbox new/list/show/destroy, lease renew, and logs --follow with --json output.

tasks.title: Implement CLI SSH helper with Tailscale-aware messaging
tasks.details: Resolve IP, print/exec ssh command, and warn when tailnet route is not reachable.

tasks.title: Implement workspace volume management on local-zfs
tasks.details: Create/attach/detach ZFS volumes, track attachment in DB, and prevent multi-attach.

tasks.title: Implement guest auto-mount for /work
tasks.details: Detect workspace disk by label/UUID, format on first attach, and mount via systemd.

tasks.title: Implement workspace rebind workflow
tasks.details: Create new sandbox, attach workspace, and safely detach/destroy old sandbox as requested.

tasks.title: Implement embedded artifact upload service in agentlabd
tasks.details: Expose 10.77.0.1:8846 upload endpoint with scoped tokens, size limits, path sanitization, and DB metadata.

tasks.title: Implement CLI artifact listing and download
tasks.details: Provide job artifacts list and download commands, including latest bundle shortcut.

tasks.title: Implement artifact retention and garbage collection
tasks.details: Apply per-profile TTLs, delete expired artifacts, and report deletions safely.

tasks.title: Ship agentlab Skills file for Claude Code CLI
tasks.details: Create skills/agentlab/SKILL.md mapping high-level commands to agentlab CLI with guardrails.

tasks.title: Package Skills with Claude Code configuration
tasks.details: Document placement and ensure install_host or template build makes Skills discoverable.

tasks.title: Enforce no-host-mount policy in provisioning
tasks.details: Add guardrails to refuse profiles requesting host bind mounts and document rationale.

tasks.title: Implement secret redaction and log safety
tasks.details: Scrub bootstrap tokens and sensitive env keys from logs with automated tests.

tasks.title: Harden agentlabd systemd service
tasks.details: Apply ProtectSystem, PrivateTmp, NoNewPrivileges, and capability restrictions while keeping provisioning functional.

tasks.title: Evaluate optional inner sandboxing for agent process (bubblewrap)
tasks.details: Prototype bubblewrap execution and document tradeoffs behind a profile flag.

tasks.title: Implement event stream storage and per-job log surfaces
tasks.details: Persist events in DB and surface recent events in job show responses.

tasks.title: Write operator runbook documentation
tasks.details: Cover template build, secrets rotation, debugging stuck sandboxes, daemon recovery, and Tailscale routing.

tasks.title: Add optional Prometheus metrics endpoint
tasks.details: Expose /metrics behind localhost-only flag with sandbox/job counters and timing distributions.

tasks.title: Create end-to-end golden path integration test
tasks.details: Automate sandbox create → run trivial repo task → upload artifact → teardown validation.

tasks.title: Add network isolation regression tests
tasks.details: Verify LAN/tailnet blocks and Internet egress from sandbox with repeatable checks.

tasks.title: Ship default profile YAMLs for yolo-ephemeral, yolo-workspace, and interactive-dev
tasks.details: Provide baseline resource/network/secrets bundle configs in scripts/profiles/defaults.yaml compatible with agentlabd loader.

tasks.title: Require explicit agent subnet/controller URLs when bootstrap/artifact listeners bind to wildcard
tasks.details: bootstrap_listen/artifact_listen allow 0.0.0.0 or :port today, which yields invalid controller/artifact URLs and disables subnet restriction. Add validation or explicit config (agent_subnet/controller_url/artifact_upload_url), enforce remoteAllowed using the configured subnet, and cover with tests.

tasks.title: Provision real VMs for sandbox new flow
tasks.details: sandbox new currently creates only a DB record. Add a provisioning pipeline for non-job sandboxes (clone template, configure cloud-init/snippet, apply profile resources, start VM, IP discovery, state transitions) and align API/CLI/docs. Ensure destroy handles missing VMs gracefully.

tasks.title: Run agentlab-agent inside repo directory in agent-runner
tasks.details: When AGENT_COMMAND defaults to agentlab-agent, agent-runner does not cd into the repo, so agents start outside the checkout. Update scripts/guest/agent-runner to run agentlab-agent from $REPO_DIR and add a regression check (unit/integration) if feasible.

tasks.title: Avoid consuming bootstrap tokens before response is ready
tasks.details: BootstrapAPI consumes the one-time token before issuing artifact tokens and building the response; any subsequent error burns the token and prevents retries. Reorder/transactionalize token consumption or add a validate-then-consume flow, and add a test for retry safety.

tasks.title: Apply profile keepalive/TTL defaults when creating jobs/sandboxes
tasks.details: Profiles define behavior.keepalive_default and behavior.ttl_minutes_default but the API currently ignores them when TTL/keepalive are omitted. Parse these defaults and apply them for job create, sandbox new, and workspace rebind (when ttl/keepalive not explicitly set). Add tests.
